name: A Purr-fect Cat-venture
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN

A Purrfect Catventure is a game about finding true love (or something like that)! You play as a normal boring cat in a world populated only by cats and other animals and try finding the superstar you fell in love with on tv! What could possibly go wrong? Lots of things appearently. Catnapping, Music, Catanistan, Horny Jail - Anything is possible!
